original_text: the priest shall examine it, and if the hair in the spot has turned white and it appears deeper than the skin, then it is a leprous disease. It has broken out in the burn, and the priest shall pronounce him unclean; it is a case of leprous disease.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 그 색점의 털이 희고 그 자리가 피부보다 우묵하면 이는 화상에서 생긴 나병인즉 제사장이 그를 부정하다 할 것은 나병의 환부가 됨이니라

sentences.original_text: and if the hair in the spot has turned white
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그 반점의 털이 희어졌다면

sentences.original_text: and it appears deeper than the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 피부보다 더 깊어 보인다면

sentences.original_text: then it is a leprous disease
It has broken out in the burn
and the priest shall pronounce him unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그를 부정하다고 선언할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: it is a case of leprous disease
